sentence: Mandela Barnes and Milwaukee Bucks executive Alex Lasry, both from Milwaukee, focused their first policy initiatives on voting rights and other issues related to protecting the democracy.
author: SCOTT BAUER
title: US Senate candidate Godlewski unveils rural Wisconsin plan
